snippet: The interviews are the latest indication that the sites have emerged as serious news organizations and a further sign of the Obama administration’s efforts to reach beyond traditional media outlets.
abstract: Digital media sites Vox and Buzzfeed gain interviews with Pres Obama; conversations offer latest hint that Obama administration wants to reach millennials and extend its reach beyond traditional news broadcasters.
lead_paragraph: The interviews are the latest indication that the sites have emerged as serious news organizations and a further sign of the Obama administration’s efforts to reach beyond traditional media outlets.

headline.main: Vox and BuzzFeed Obtain Interviews With Obama
headline.print_headline: Vox and BuzzFeed Obtain Interviews With Obama
